publisher_name.desc: The data publisher's name. The publisher may be an individual or an institution.

id.desc: The combination of the "naming authority" and the "id" should be a globally unique identifier for the dataset.

keywords_vocabulary.desc: If you are following a guideline for the words/phrases in your "keywords" attribute, put the name of that guideline here.
